question.text: Question 1: What is an integration model?

options.option: A framework for integrating software components
A programming language for data integration
A design pattern for user interface integration
A protocol for network integration

question.answer: A framework for integrating software components

question.text: Question 2: What is meant by point-to-point integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems exchange data in real-time

question.answer: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system

question.text: Question 3: What is meant by hub-and-spoke integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems exchange data in real-time

question.answer: An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub

question.text: Question 4: What is meant by data-centric integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems exchange data in real-time

question.answer: An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format

question.text: Question 5: What is meant by message-oriented integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems exchange data through messages

question.answer: An integration model where systems exchange data through messages

question.text: Question 6: What is meant by service-oriented integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems provide and consume services

question.answer: An integration model where systems provide and consume services

question.text: Question 7: What is meant by event-driven integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems communicate based on triggered events or signals

question.answer: An integration model where systems communicate based on triggered events or signals

question.text: Question 8: What is meant by process-centric integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems collaborate to execute a business process

question.answer: An integration model where systems collaborate to execute a business process

question.text: Question 9: What is meant by file-based integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using files
An integration model where systems exchange data through messages

question.answer: An integration model where data is transferred using files

question.text: Question 10: What is meant by cloud-based integration model?

options.option: An integration model where each system is directly connected to every other system
An integration model where systems communicate through a central hub
An integration model where data is transferred using a specific data format
An integration model where systems are connected through cloud services

question.answer: An integration model where systems are connected through cloud services
